name: vite-express-prisma
author: Imraan-Hendricks
description: Vanilla TypeScript client side using Vite coupled with an Express backend

scripts.setup: npm ci && cd ./server && npm ci && cd ../client && npm ci
scripts.build: cd ./server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd ./server && npm run dev" "cd ./client && npm run dev"
